locations.name: Müllheim
locations.description: Birth

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Travels to Switzerland often on business.

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Markus Heim and Selma Mayer marry. They are refused permanent residence in Switzerland. Commutes to Kreuzlingen for work.

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Banned from entering Switzerland, but allowed to commute to work in Kreuzlingen.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Kristallnacht. The family flees to Switzerland.

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Sent back to Germany.

locations.name: Dijon
locations.description: The family flees to France, where they live with relatives.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: War begins while Markus is in Switzerland to liquidate his company. He cannot return to France as he is German.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Germany invades France. Markus registers as a volunteer with the Swiss military authorities.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: The Thurgau police commander proposes that Markus be expelled to Germany.

locations.name: Davesco
locations.description: Sent to a work camp for emigrants. Markus writes to many embassies seeking visas for himself and his family, without success.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Returns to Kreuzlingen to rejoin his wife and daughter.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: The family is threatened with expulsion to Germany, but is allowed to move to Basel Stadt, partly thanks to the VSJF.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: Finally granted permanent residence in Switzerland.

locations.name: Müllheim
locations.description: Birth

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Grows up in Switzerland with her uncle (exact dates unknown).

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Markus Heim and Selma Mayer marry. They are refused permanent residence in Switzerland and move to Konstanz.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Kristallnacht. The family flees to Switzerland.

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Sent back to Germany.

locations.name: Dijon
locations.description: The family flees to France, where they live with relatives.

locations.name: Toulouse
locations.description: Selma and Margot flee to unoccupied Toulouse.

locations.name: Aspet
locations.description: Forced to move to Aspet, from where they are not allowed to leave.

locations.name: Aulus-les-Bains
locations.description: Forced to move to Aulus-les-Bains, from where they are not allowed to leave.

locations.name: Aulus-les-Bains
locations.description: Fakes a nervous breakdown to escape deportation to Poland, and is moved to a sanatorium. Other refugees, including relatives, are deported.

locations.name: Geneva
locations.description: With other refugees, hide from the French authorities, travel across France and cross the Swiss border in an overnight march (exact location unknown). Kept in a Swiss reception camp for months.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Taken in by relatives in Kreuzlingen. Selma and Margot were admitted to Switzerland in part because Markus had raised 5000 CHF as collateral.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: The family is threatened with expulsion to Germany, but is allowed to move to Basel Stadt, partly thanks to the VSJF.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: Finally granted permanent residence in Switzerland.

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Birth

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Kristallnacht. The family flees to Switzerland.

locations.name: Konstanz
locations.description: Sent back to Germany.

locations.name: Luzern
locations.description: Taken to Luzern to stay with a family, by the Swiss Relief Organisation for Refugee Children.

locations.name: Dijon
locations.description: The family flees to France, where they live with relatives.

locations.name: Toulouse
locations.description: Selma and Margot flee to unoccupied Toulouse.

locations.name: Aspet
locations.description: Forced to move to Aspet, from where they are not allowed to leave.

locations.name: Aulus-les-Bains
locations.description: Forced to move to Aulus-les-Bains, from where they are not allowed to leave.

locations.name: Aulus-les-Bains
locations.description: Hides in a cornfield to escape deportation to Poland. She is then sheltered in a monastery for weeks. Other refugees, including relatives, are deported.

locations.name: Geneva
locations.description: With other refugees, hide from the French authorities, travel across France and cross the Swiss border in an overnight march (exact location unknown). Kept in a Swiss reception camp for months.

locations.name: Kreuzlingen
locations.description: Taken in by relatives in Kreuzlingen. Selma and Margot were admitted to Switzerland in part because Markus had raised 5000 CHF as collateral.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: The family is threatened with expulsion to Germany, but is allowed to move to Basel Stadt, partly thanks to the VSJF.

locations.name: Basel Stadt
locations.description: Finally granted permanent residence in Switzerland.
